profile.about:
Passionate tech enthusiast with over a decade in the industry. Skilled in the latest web technologies and methodologies with a focus on TypeScript, HTML5 video streaming, site-speed optimization, accessibility, and cross-platform compatibility.

Seeking a dynamic web developer role where I can immerse myself in intriguing projects, continuously expand my skill set, and make meaningful contributions. Eager to join a team where innovation thrives and where my passion for learning and creativity can flourish.

Education:
  - Bachelor of Science in Mathematics from McGill University
  - Diploma of Web Programming from Concordia University

Qualifications:
  - Languages: English, Tibetan, French
  - Environments: Linux (Debian, Arch), Windows, MacOS, Android, iOS
  - Code: TypeScript, React, Vue, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, LESS, Responsive Design, PWA, PHP, SQL, C#, C++, Java
  - Testing: Jest, ESLint, Playwright, SonarQube
  - CI/CD: GitHub Actions, CircleCI, Bamboo, JFrog
  - Tools: Git, SVN, NPM, PNPM, Yarn, Webpack, Turbopack, Gulp, Husky, Docker, Vagrant
  - Learning: Node.js, DevOps, Google Cloud Platform, Google BigQuery, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform

Interests: Cycling, camping, hiking, yoga, mathematics, photography, gardening, permaculture, and EVE Online
profile.name: Tenzin Namgyal
